moise.os.ns

Class Norm

  • java.lang.Object
    • moise.common.MoiseElement
      • moise.os.ns.Norm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable, Identifiable, ToXML

    public class Norm
extends MoiseElement
implements ToXML
    Represents a norm (permission, obligation, ...) from a role to a mission.
    See Also:
